heading: HR00081
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON COOPERATIVE DEVELOPMENT AND ENERGY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A REVIEW AND ASSESSMENT OF THE PERFORMANCE OF ELECTRIC COOPERATIVES IN THE PHILIPPINES IN THE CONTEXT OF THEIR ROLE IN THE ATTAINMENT OF TOTAL RURAL ELECTRIFICATION AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IN THE COUNTRY

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00081
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON COOPERATIVE DEVELOPMENT AND ENERGY OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT A REVIEW AND ASSESSMENT OF THE PERFORMANCE OF ELECTRIC COOPERATIVES IN THE PHILIPPINES IN THE CONTEXT OF THEIR ROLE IN THE ATTAINMENT OF TOTAL RURAL ELECTRIFICATION AND ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT IN THE COUNTRY
